attributes.action: Pass a law which prevents peerages being sold.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the recent result of the Crown Prosecution Service's investigation into the cash for honours affair, please give your support to this new law which may prevent peerages being given for cash donations or loans:

The new law: As of today, all funds donated to any political party are to be paid back to the donor upon the donor's receipt of a peerage.
